title: Will Liz Cheney be Kamala's trump card?
content: Liz Cheney, a conservative Republican, and Kamala Harris, the liberal vice president, jointly criticized Donald Trump and his MAGA movement in a pivotal event in Wisconsin. Cheney highlighted Trump's flaws, supporting Harris as the patriotic choice. Harris emphasized unity across parties to protect US democracy, with Obama set to boost her campaign.
summary: Liz Cheney, a conservative Republican, and Kamala Harris, the liberal vice president, jointly criticized Donald Trump and his MAGA movement in a pivotal event in Wisconsin. Cheney highlighted Trump's flaws, supporting Harris as the patriotic choice. Harris emphasized unity across parties to protect US democracy, with Obama set to boost her campaign.

title: Israeli military claims 250 Hezbollah fighters killed in Lebanon in ground operation
content: Israeli armed forces reported killing around 250 Hezbollah combatants, including commanders, in their recent ground operation in Lebanon. They targeted 2,000 Hezbollah sites, including intelligence headquarters. Additionally, two IDF soldiers were killed in northern Israel. Iran's Supreme Leader publicly supported attacks against Israel.
summary: Israeli armed forces reported killing around 250 Hezbollah combatants, including commanders, in their recent ground operation in Lebanon. They targeted 2,000 Hezbollah sites, including intelligence headquarters. Additionally, two IDF soldiers were killed in northern Israel. Iran's Supreme Leader publicly supported attacks against Israel.

title: Man arrested after calling 911 to report lit candle as fire hazard in New Jersey
content: A New Jersey man has been charged for misuse of the 911 emergency line. Alfredo Gonzalez falsely reported a lit scented candle as a fire hazard and continued making non-emergent complaints. Police emphasize the importance of reserving emergency calls for genuine needs, stressing the adverse effects of such fabrications on the emergency response system.
summary: A New Jersey man has been charged for misuse of the 911 emergency line. Alfredo Gonzalez falsely reported a lit scented candle as a fire hazard and continued making non-emergent complaints. Police emphasize the importance of reserving emergency calls for genuine needs, stressing the adverse effects of such fabrications on the emergency response system.

title: How Nigeria-South Africa rivalry turned ugly
content: Recent tensions between Nigeria and South Africa almost prevented Nigeria's youth basketball team from competing in South Africa. Strained relations, dating back to apartheid and recent violence against Nigerians, continue to impact sports, music, and other areas. Both nations would benefit from overcoming their rivalry to foster better cooperation.
summary: Recent tensions between Nigeria and South Africa almost prevented Nigeria's youth basketball team from competing in South Africa. Strained relations, dating back to apartheid and recent violence against Nigerians, continue to impact sports, music, and other areas. Both nations would benefit from overcoming their rivalry to foster better cooperation.

title: Pakistan seals off capital, suspends internet ahead of rally by Imran Khan's supporters
content: The Pakistani government blocked key routes to Islamabad, suspended Internet services, and shut down schools to prevent Imran Khan supporters from protesting for his release. Despite the ban, Khan's party insisted on rallying, calling it a constitutional right, while authorities warned of no leniency.
summary: The Pakistani government blocked key routes to Islamabad, suspended Internet services, and shut down schools to prevent Imran Khan supporters from protesting for his release. Despite the ban, Khan's party insisted on rallying, calling it a constitutional right, while authorities warned of no leniency.

title: Meghan, Harry completely ditched by David and Victoria Beckham? The real reason is...
content: Before Meghan's wedding, she reached out to Victoria for advice of best facials and hairdresser in London. But the story was leaked to the UK Sun. Since Meghan did not leak it to the press, it was presumably Victoria and Harry was asked to complain to David. The Beckhams denied any leak but Harry and Meghan became distrustful of them.
summary: Before Meghan's wedding, she reached out to Victoria for advice of best facials and hairdresser in London. But the story was leaked to the UK Sun. Since Meghan did not leak it to the press, it was presumably Victoria and Harry was asked to complain to David. The Beckhams denied any leak but Harry and Meghan became distrustful of them.

title: Diddy told his 9-year-old victim 'I'll make you a star', reveals lawyer
content: The Diddy case is turning murkier by the day with a helpline receiving 12,000 calls against Diddy in 24 hours. The helpline was reportedly set up by Texas-based lawyer Tony Buzbee who is in the process of slapping lawsuits against Diddy on behalf of 120 sex abuse victims. The 120 victims include one who was only nine years old at the time of the abuse. Buzbee also said he has a list of celebrities that will shock people
summary: The Diddy case is turning murkier by the day with a helpline receiving 12,000 calls against Diddy in 24 hours. The helpline was reportedly set up by Texas-based lawyer Tony Buzbee who is in the process of slapping lawsuits against Diddy on behalf of 120 sex abuse victims. The 120 victims include one who was only nine years old at the time of the abuse. Buzbee also said he has a list of celebrities that will shock people

title: Donald Trump livid after Liz Cheney mentions his 'spray tanning' at Kamala Harris rally?
content: At the Thursday rally, Liz mentioned Donald Trump's 'spray tanning' in a tongue-in-cheek manner and said she was a Republican even before Donald Trump started spray-tanning. “Donald Trump was willing to sacrifice our Capitol, to allow law enforcement officers to be beaten and brutalized in his name, and to violate the law and the Constitution in order to seize power for himself," she said.
summary: At the Thursday rally, Liz mentioned Donald Trump's 'spray tanning' in a tongue-in-cheek manner and said she was a Republican even before Donald Trump started spray-tanning. “Donald Trump was willing to sacrifice our Capitol, to allow law enforcement officers to be beaten and brutalized in his name, and to violate the law and the Constitution in order to seize power for himself," she said.

title: Jaishankar meets Sri Lanka's main opposition leader Sajith Premadasa
content: External affairs minister S Jaishankar meets with Sajith Premadasa, Sri Lanka's opposition leader, during his visit to Colombo. Jaishankar is the first foreign dignitary to visit since the NPP government took power. Both leaders reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening India-Sri Lanka relations and regional development.
summary: External affairs minister S Jaishankar meets with Sajith Premadasa, Sri Lanka's opposition leader, during his visit to Colombo. Jaishankar is the first foreign dignitary to visit since the NPP government took power. Both leaders reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening India-Sri Lanka relations and regional development.

title: Frankfurt airport faces disruptions due to air traffic system fault
content: Frankfurt Airport warned of potential flight delays and cancellations due to a technical problem with the German traffic control system. The issue, affecting data transmission nationwide and other hubs like Dusseldorf, was resolved later. Travellers were advised to check flight statuses as Frankfurt, Germany's busiest airport, experienced technical faults starting from 10 a.m.
summary: Frankfurt Airport warned of potential flight delays and cancellations due to a technical problem with the German traffic control system. The issue, affecting data transmission nationwide and other hubs like Dusseldorf, was resolved later. Travellers were advised to check flight statuses as Frankfurt, Germany's busiest airport, experienced technical faults starting from 10 a.m.

title: EAM Jaishankar's Sri Lanka visit commences on Friday, says 'good to be in Colombo again'
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrives in Sri Lanka to engage with the new leadership, marking the first official visit since their presidential election. The visit aligns with India's Neighbourhood First Policy and SAGAR outlook, focusing on strengthening bilateral ties and collaboration across various platforms.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrives in Sri Lanka to engage with the new leadership, marking the first official visit since their presidential election. The visit aligns with India's Neighbourhood First Policy and SAGAR outlook, focusing on strengthening bilateral ties and collaboration across various platforms.

title: Heroic passengers unite to protect woman from assault on flight
content: Passengers and flight attendants on an American Airlines flight from Miami to Charlotte intervened when a man allegedly assaulted a woman in first class. Multiple passengers confronted the man, and upon arrival in Charlotte, local law enforcement escorted both individuals off the plane. The incident is under investigation.
summary: Passengers and flight attendants on an American Airlines flight from Miami to Charlotte intervened when a man allegedly assaulted a woman in first class. Multiple passengers confronted the man, and upon arrival in Charlotte, local law enforcement escorted both individuals off the plane. The incident is under investigation.

title: FEMA faces funding shortage for Hurricane relief, critics blame migrant aid
content: Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas revealed that FEMA lacks sufficient funds for the Atlantic hurricane season. Criticism arose due to FEMA's $640.9 million allocation this year for asylum seeker assistance. Republican lawmakers like Texas Governor Greg Abbott demand redirecting funds to disaster relief amid Hurricane Helene's devastation, highlighting the political tension over federal spending priorities.
summary: Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas revealed that FEMA lacks sufficient funds for the Atlantic hurricane season. Criticism arose due to FEMA's $640.9 million allocation this year for asylum seeker assistance. Republican lawmakers like Texas Governor Greg Abbott demand redirecting funds to disaster relief amid Hurricane Helene's devastation, highlighting the political tension over federal spending priorities.

title: Watch: Two moms turn children's playground into MMA arena as they exchange punches, kicks
content: Two mothers caused chaos at a children's indoor playground in China by getting into a violent fight in a ball pit. The confrontation involved hair-pulling and kicking as shocked onlookers, including other parents and children, watched. Some tried to intervene, highlighting the unpredictable tensions that can emerge in public spaces designed for family fun.
summary: Two mothers caused chaos at a children's indoor playground in China by getting into a violent fight in a ball pit. The confrontation involved hair-pulling and kicking as shocked onlookers, including other parents and children, watched. Some tried to intervene, highlighting the unpredictable tensions that can emerge in public spaces designed for family fun.

title: Meghan's 'vanished' ring worries Prince William back home: 'It has set off alarm bells'
content: Prince William is reportedly concerned about the disappearance of Princess Diana’s jewelry pieces previously held by Meghan Markle. Among these is Meghan’s engagement ring, which Harry designed using Diana’s diamonds. The ring hasn't been seen recently, raising questions and worries about preserving Diana’s legacy, especially from Prince William.
summary: Prince William is reportedly concerned about the disappearance of Princess Diana’s jewelry pieces previously held by Meghan Markle. Among these is Meghan’s engagement ring, which Harry designed using Diana’s diamonds. The ring hasn't been seen recently, raising questions and worries about preserving Diana’s legacy, especially from Prince William.

title: Princess Kate helps fulfill bucket list wish of 16-year-old cancer patient, shares emotional hug
content: Liz Hatton, a 16-year-old with terminal cancer, met the Princess of Wales at Windsor Castle, where she was praised for her photography. This encounter was part of fulfilling Hatton's photography bucket list, shared by her mother to create cherished memories in her remaining time.
summary: Liz Hatton, a 16-year-old with terminal cancer, met the Princess of Wales at Windsor Castle, where she was praised for her photography. This encounter was part of fulfilling Hatton's photography bucket list, shared by her mother to create cherished memories in her remaining time.

title: Student 'ruthlessly tackled' for failing to tap his travel card on bus in Australia
content: A student allegedly encountered excessive force by transport officers on a Melbourne bus for not tapping his Myki travel card. Videos show the student pinned and gasping for air, while officers restrained him, sparking online outrage. Police responded, arresting a man but did not mention the Myki card issue. An investigation is underway.
summary: A student allegedly encountered excessive force by transport officers on a Melbourne bus for not tapping his Myki travel card. Videos show the student pinned and gasping for air, while officers restrained him, sparking online outrage. Police responded, arresting a man but did not mention the Myki card issue. An investigation is underway.

title: What Trump said on wife Melania backing abortion rights in new memoir
content: Former President Donald Trump expressed support for Melania Trump's public declaration in her upcoming memoir, where she backs abortion rights, differing from his conservative stance. Trump emphasised the importance of sticking to one's convictions, while Melania advocates for individual freedom and a woman's right to control her body.
summary: Former President Donald Trump expressed support for Melania Trump's public declaration in her upcoming memoir, where she backs abortion rights, differing from his conservative stance. Trump emphasised the importance of sticking to one's convictions, while Melania advocates for individual freedom and a woman's right to control her body.

title: 'Will be there to ...': Elon Musk set to attend Trump’s rally at July assassination attempt site
content: Elon Musk has confirmed his attendance at Donald Trump’s upcoming Pennsylvania rally. Following a previous assassination attempt on Trump in Butler, the event will have heightened security measures. This rally aims to mobilize voters in the crucial swing state, amid a tight race with Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.
summary: Elon Musk has confirmed his attendance at Donald Trump’s upcoming Pennsylvania rally. Following a previous assassination attempt on Trump in Butler, the event will have heightened security measures. This rally aims to mobilize voters in the crucial swing state, amid a tight race with Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.

title: Was Jennifer Aniston secretly dating Barack Obama? Actress responds
content: Jennifer Aniston used her appearance on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ to humorously debunk tabloid rumors, including a false romance with Barack Obama and her unconventional beauty treatments. She also shared unique personal anecdotes, such as traveling with jars of olives and her therapist's ashes, and reflected on her childhood and family traditions.
summary: Jennifer Aniston used her appearance on ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live’ to humorously debunk tabloid rumors, including a false romance with Barack Obama and her unconventional beauty treatments. She also shared unique personal anecdotes, such as traveling with jars of olives and her therapist's ashes, and reflected on her childhood and family traditions.
